name: Magic Bubble Shooter
description:
Magic Bubble Shooter

Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!
Classic and amazing shooting bubble game is here ! Magic Bubble Shooter saga is puzzle game , Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst. Clear all the bubbles to level up
Magic Bubble Shooter provides fun and addictive game play, entertainment for the whole family.
Bubble Shooter New 2016. Bubble shoot.
How to play:
- Tap where you want the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear the current level to unlock the next one.
Thank for play Magic Bubble Shooter
